reviewText: Buy it, you'll like it, if you're much like me! I'm always glad to see Heather Vandeven and Georgia Jones, and each of them has two sexy scenes in this one. Blonde Heather was a "PENTHOUSE" Pet of the Year, maybe for 2007 or 2008, and brunette Georgia was a summer 2011 Pet. Kayden Kross is also a Pet and has 2 nice scenes, but I prefer Heather and Georgia. "Miss Laura Lee" is also in it, but her sexiest scenes are elsewhere. She isn't as attractive as Heather or Georgia to me. Kayden beats her too I say. Zoe Britton is fatter than I like, so she's worst in this DVD to me. I guess I rate them thusly: 1. Heather Vandeven and Georgia Jones are tied, 2. Kayden Kross, 3. Laura Lee, 4. Zoe Britton.

This DVD is great. The women are all super sex. They all striptease under the sun and by the pool. no hardcore stuff just pure 100% high quality eyecandy. No plot or story or fake crimes to solve. Beautiful women enjoying removing their bikinis. no girl-girl its all solo scene after solo scene. Some people like to look at waterfalls and virtual gardens. This DVD is the same thing but for men and women who would like to relax by watching inviting, attractive, seductive women.
